thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Liverpool Exploits a Rare Tactical Error by Soccer’s Mad Genius

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Liverpool Exploits a Rare Tactical Error by Soccer’s Mad Genius
text:
LIVERPOOL, England—Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola had always been the first to say that no club could spend an entire season undefeated. Not with the furious rhythm of elite teams in multiple tournaments.
But it was beginning to seem like his Manchester City might spend the entire season unsolved.
The handful of defeats in their campaign...
